attributes.name: getAllUsers

getAllUsers().details: Returns the list of all users who have registered certificates.

getCertificate(string).details: Returns the certificate data for a given user.
getCertificate(string).return: The certificate bytes associated with the user.

registerCertificate(bytes,string).details: Registers a certificate for a given user and stores the data.     Also tracks the user in an array for enumeration.

params.user: The user identifier (e.g., address or username).
